pull.title: Canonicalize version string, and return in HTTP headers Server, User-Agent
pull.body:
Two changes, in two commits:

1) Make version number->string conversion consistent throughout bitcoin.

2) Major HTTP clients send full version string in User-Agent header.  Major HTTP servers send full version string in Server header.  Update our RPC code to follow suit.

events.body: Looks good, but BlueMatt says it crashes the GUI, so that's a blocker

events.message: Ensure version number->string conversion is consistent
Send/return full bitcoin version string in Server and User-Agent HTTP headers
